scripts.compile-min: elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=main.js && uglifyjs main.js --compress 'pure_funcs="F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9",pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | uglifyjs --mangle --output=main.js
scripts.release: git checkout master && git push && git checkout gh-pages && git merge master --no-edit && yarn compile-min && git commit -am "Publish updated version" && git push
